text: Anthony Anholt known as Tony Anholt was a British actor. He is best known for playing Charles Frere in Howards' Way, Tony Verdeschi in Space: 1999, Paul Buchet in The Protectors and guest starred in Coronation Street. He was born in 19 January 1941. He died in 26 July 2002. He was married to Tracey Childs and is the father of actor Christien Anholt of Relic Hunter fame. ==Other websites== * * Category:1941 births Category:2002 deaths Category:British actors
title: Tony Anholt
